g1.title: Relation between tags in stackoverflow
g1.description: This grapgh shows the relation between first 60 tags and each tags first 60 related tags.

g2.title: Which is the trending tag last year?
g2.description: You can sort the the data in yearly wise by clicking on the bottom year tab. The tags will be rearranged in descending order

g3.title: How tags are growing ?
g3.description: This graph shows the growth of tags in each month.The vertical position of circle represent the count of questions in a month.

g4.title: Did you code on last Christmas day ?
g4.description: It’s the punch-card visualization of question asked in each day of November-December in 2013

g5.title: Pulp Fiction
g5.description: It’s the punch-card visualization of question asked in each day of November-December in 2013
